div.p:
( a) Scaled average variance (at ENSO band) in temperature records from the East Antarctic ice core and tree ring are compared with well mixed GHG radiative forcing derived from the PMIP3 model simulations of the last Millennium
40 . This schematic shows longitudinal changes in the SST anomaly during the EP and CP type El Nino ( b, c) and atmospheric teleconnections to Antarctica. ( d, e) This figure shows changes in atmospheric circulation to an enhanced radiative greenhouse gas forcing based on a coupled global climate model (CGCM). This figure is modified from the Brandefelt and Källén
46 . ( d) Zonal stationary Rossby wavenumber (Ks) and ( e) variance for summer (Dec–Feb) of the average −30 years for the periods of 1860–89 and 2070–99.
